amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to add stain resistant, water resistant, and grease resistant coat ings that are not subject to requirements under section 409 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to the list of products eligible for a voluntary label indicating an absence of PFAS.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to add stain resistant, water resistant, and grease resistant coat ings that are not subject to requirements under section 409 of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to the list of products eligible for a voluntary label indicating an absence of PFAS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Malinowski amendment (A019) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Malinowski amendment (A019) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Malinowski.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Malinowski amendment (A019) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
